title: Authors and Citation
text: Peter Fuleky. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Fuleky P (2025). fcflow: Forecast Workflow. R package version 0.0.0.9005, https://uhero.github.io/fcflow/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {fcflow: Forecast Workflow},   author = {Peter Fuleky},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9005},   url = {https://uhero.github.io/fcflow/}, }

title: Forecast Workflow
text: Forecast workflow

title: Combine Individual Equation Files — combine_equations
text: Reads individual equation text files, filters optional subset, writes combined BIMETS model file current vintage.

title: Combine Individual Equation Files — combine_equations
text: cfg Configuration list [load_forecast_cfg()].

title: Combine Individual Equation Files — combine_equations
text: Invisible BIMETS model object created combined equations

what: Optionally Extend Master Dataset with AREMOS History — extend_qmain_history
title: Optionally Extend Master Dataset with AREMOS History — extend_qmain_history
text: Pulls 11Q4 AREMOS exports splices longer histories onto main dataset requested.

title: Optionally Extend Master Dataset with AREMOS History — extend_qmain_history
Optionally Extend Master Dataset with AREMOS History — extend_qmain_history
text: data_qmain_xts xts object containing UDAMAN pull. dat_raw_dir Base directory raw data files.

title: Optionally Extend Master Dataset with AREMOS History — extend_qmain_history
text: xts object, potentially extended archival data.

title: Import Existing Forecasts — import_existing_fcst
text: Loads quarterly annual existing forecasts, constructs quarterly pseudo-exogenous series required QMOD.

title: Import Existing Forecasts — import_existing_fcst
code: import_existing_fcst(   dat_raw_dir,   dat_prcsd_dir,   equations_qmod,   data_qmod_xts,   save_outputs )

title: Import Existing Forecasts — import_existing_fcst
text: dat_raw_dir Base directory raw existing forecasts equations_qmod BIMETS equation bundle (used exogenous list). data_qmod_xts xts object filtered QMOD dataset. save_outputs logical indicating data saved.

title: Import Existing Forecasts — import_existing_fcst
text: List `data_existing_fcst` (xts) `exog_list` (character vector).

title: Load Forecast Configuration — load_forecast_cfg
text: Reads YAML configuration file stores forecast parameters vintages, output settings, workflow toggles.

title: Load Forecast Configuration — load_forecast_cfg
text: path Optional explicit path YAML configuration. `NULL`, loader checks `MODDEV_CONFIG`, packaged default `inst/extdata/config/current_config.yml`, finally `config/current_config.yml` project root.

title: Load Forecast Configuration — load_forecast_cfg
text: named list containing configuration entries.

title: Build Master Quarterly Dataset — make_data_qmain
text: Downloads (reloads) history, forecast inputs, adds indicators, saves quarterly master data file current vintage.

title: Build Master Quarterly Dataset — make_data_qmain
text: cfg List-like configuration, normally [load_forecast_cfg()]. indicators Optional xts object indicator variables; `NULL` function reloads disk using configured file name.

title: Build Master Quarterly Dataset — make_data_qmain
text: Invisible xts object containing master quarterly dataset.

title: Prepare Model-Ready Data — make_data_qmod
text: Filters master dataset variables required QMOD, adds external pseudo-exogenous series existing forecast, saves model inputs.

title: Prepare Model-Ready Data — make_data_qmod
code: make_data_qmod(   cfg = load_forecast_cfg(),   data_qmain = NULL,   equations_qmod = NULL )

title: Prepare Model-Ready Data — make_data_qmod
text: cfg Configuration list [load_forecast_cfg()]. data_qmain Optional preloaded master dataset. equations_qmod Optional preloaded model object.

title: Prepare Model-Ready Data — make_data_qmod
text: Invisible list containing processed data, previous forecasts,   equations, extension range.

title: Build Indicator Series — make_indicators
text: Creates single-period, step, seasonal, trend, constant indicator variables across full sample stores reuse

title: Build Indicator Series — make_indicators
text: cfg Configuration list produced [load_forecast_cfg()].

title: Build Indicator Series — make_indicators
text: Invisible xts object containing indicator matrix.

title: Estimate or Refresh QMOD — make_qmod
text: Loads data equations, optionally re-estimates quarterly model, persists fitted model, add factors, ragged-edge metadata.

title: Estimate or Refresh QMOD — make_qmod
code: make_qmod(cfg = load_forecast_cfg(), data_qmod = NULL, equations_qmod = NULL)

title: Estimate or Refresh QMOD — make_qmod
text: cfg Configuration list [load_forecast_cfg()]. data_qmod Optional preloaded xts dataset (defaults saved output). equations_qmod Optional preloaded model definition.

title: Estimate or Refresh QMOD — make_qmod
text: Invisible list estimation results, add factors, exogenous   ranges, underlying data.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: See magrittr::%>% details.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: result calling `rhs(lhs)`.

title: Plot Forecast Histories — plot_qsol
text: Combines current forecast, previous vintage, history create interactive HTML plots (optionally annual summaries) selected series.

title: Plot Forecast Histories — plot_qsol
code: plot_qsol(   cfg = load_forecast_cfg(),   fcst = NULL,   prev_fcst = NULL,   history = NULL )

title: Plot Forecast Histories — plot_qsol
text: cfg Configuration list [load_forecast_cfg()]. fcst Optional xts/tibble override current forecast. prev_fcst Optional override previous forecast data. history Optional override historical data.

title: Plot Forecast Histories — plot_qsol
text: Invisible list containing plot objects, combined data,   file path rendered HTML report.

title: Simulate the Quarterly Model — sol_qmod
text: Runs BIMETS simulation supplied vintage add-factors, returning full forecast trajectory alongside metadata.

title: Simulate the Quarterly Model — sol_qmod
code: sol_qmod(   cfg = load_forecast_cfg(),   est_equations = NULL,   exog_range = NULL,   add_factors = NULL )

title: Simulate the Quarterly Model — sol_qmod
text: cfg Configuration list [load_forecast_cfg()]. est_equations Optional BIMETS model object data attached. exog_range Optional ragged-edge metadata list. add_factors Optional xts object add factors.

title: Simulate the Quarterly Model — sol_qmod
text: Invisible list containing BIMETS simulation object, forecast,   add factors, exogenous range used.

title: Enrich Master Quarterly Dataset — wrangle_data_qmain
text: Applies indicator adjustments, fills missing histories, adds constructed series required quarterly model.

title: Enrich Master Quarterly Dataset — wrangle_data_qmain
text: data_qmain_xts xts object produced [make_data_qmain()].

title: Enrich Master Quarterly Dataset — wrangle_data_qmain
text: Modified xts object additional constructed series.
